subject: Re: For Stefan  Re: [EVP-ITC] A new hack?
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Ron,

all I do is type in the words a believe to hear and compare if it sounds
equal to the supposed EVP.

Stefan

-- 

> Hi Stefan Can you give a bit more detail on how you use TalkAny to
> transcribe your EVPs. Sounds perfect for my tin ear or for my kids
> trying to learn English. Ron L
